title: 1 Bed / 1 Bath. Convenient in-home washer and dryer included.
neighborhood: St. Paul - Downtown Lowertown Historic District
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Lofts at Farmers Market!', 'Located at:', '260 5th St E', 'St. Paul, MN 55101', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 1', '# of Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 834 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1635/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', 'Another feature that makes the Lofts stand out in the crowd is our prime location.', "You'll find us in the Historic Lowertown neighborhood across from the Farmer's Market and CHS Field, plus the Union Depot Light Rail Station is just 1.5 blocks away!", "Transportation is a breeze with I-94, I-35E, Hwy 5, and US 52 nearby, but you won't have to travel far to find great destinations.", "Mears Park is just across the street and it's a great place to go for a walk, have a picnic, or enjoy one of the many community events including the Twin Cities Jazz Festival and Music in Mears summertime concerts.", "There are also plenty of restaurants, shops, and entertainment venues close by, so you'll never get bored living at the Lofts!", 'Community Features:', '● Accepts Credit Cards', '● Barbecue Area', '● Bicycle Storage', '● Freeway Access', '● Furnished Units Available', '● Grocery Delivery Available', '● Parking Garage', '● Smoke Free', '● Trash Chutes', '● Weight Machines', '● 24 Hour Availability', '● 24-Hour Fitness Center', '● Barbecue/Grill Area', '● Community-Wide WiFi', '● Dry Cleaning Service Available', '● Kingsley Excellence Award', '● Pet Washing Station', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Reservable Clubhouse', '● Resident Lounge/ Clubroom', 'Unit Features:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Big Windows', '● Dishwasher', '● High Ceilings', '● Kitchen Island', '● Linen Closet*', 'In Select Homes', '● Open Floorplan', '● Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '● Washer/Dryer Full Size in Every Home', '● Window Coverings', 'Office Hours:', 'Tue - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Dogs and cats welcome: Max. 2 allowed per home, deposit $200, one-time fee $200, monthly rent $40.', 'No weight limit, breed restrictions apply.', 'Leasing Options:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Management:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'Please note pricing and availability subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A0F5A06D1115439']
